info: Explore real-world locations to search for different kinds of Pokémon! You can catch them by tapping on the Pokémon and flicking a Poke Ball at it.
These are real-world locations that are marked as stops for you to get items, like Pokeballs and potion, to use in the game.

Try to discover and catch at least one of every Pokémon available. You can discover more Pokémon by evolving your Pokémon, which can be done by collecting lots of the same Pokémon and transferring them to get candies for evolution! Also, you can gather items at PokeStops, maybe getting an egg, and walking around for the egg to hatch into Pokémon!

When you reach level 5, you can pick a team to join and can fight at a gym where other team members have placed their Pokémon. Training Pokémon at your team’s gym will increase prestige points, which will make the gym harder for the other teams to take over.
